4 in color work using needles 4 5 mm always use the needle size that gives you the correct gauge in both height and width measured after washing and blocking **pattern information** the dorthea cowl is worked from the bottom up first you knit the two identical ribbed edges then join them together to continue working stranded knitting in the round according to the chart **find the pattern in more
